name: OpenMageModuleFostering/Ifuturz_Questionanswer
description:
Product Question-Answer extension is a robust Magento extension that works as a question bank and let your customers to easily clear their doubts on the product page itself. It helps the store owners to answer the customer questions and clear their doubts with them in detail. 

Moreover, it is helpful for the new customers to know more about the product before buying.
